# Genres

## 19. Match the niche contemporary music genre to its description (1 Point Each). Additionally, match the song played to the genre its from (1 Point Each).

##

**Hyperpop, Zoomer Gaze, Hexd, Chillwave, Neoperreo, Future Funk**

<span style="font-size: smaller;">
A. Dark, experimental electronic music characterized by heavily distorted bass, industrial elements, and pitched-up vocals. Incorporates horror-like sounds and unsettling samples with aggressive, glitchy beats.
</span>

<span style="font-size: smaller;">
B. An exaggerated, maximalist take on pop music featuring distorted bass, Auto-Tuned vocals, and glitchy electronic production.
</span>

<span style="font-size: smaller;">
C. Blends dreamy, reverb-heavy guitars with trap beats and bedroom pop production. Mixes nostalgic 90s alternative sounds with contemporary music sensibilities.
</span>

<span style="font-size: smaller;">
D. Fast-paced electronic genre that samples and remixes Japanese city pop and disco, adding heavy compression and modern dance beats.
</span>

<span style="font-size: smaller;">
E. Electronic music genre that combines reggaeton rhythms with experimental low-fi production and aggressive, often sexually explicit lyrics
</span>

<span style="font-size: smaller;">
F. Dark electronic music using occult symbols, chopped and screwed vocals, and trap-influenced beats. 
</span>

<span style="font-size: smaller;">
G. Southern rap mixed with Memphis-style production, heavy bass, and cowbell beats.
</span>
